shipping.general: We offer standard, express, and international shipping options. Shipping times vary by location.
shipping.cost: Standard shipping is free on all orders over $50. Express shipping fees depend on your location and will be calculated at checkout.
shipping.time: Standard shipping takes 3-5 business days. Express shipping takes 1-2 business days within the country.
shipping.tracking: Once your order is shipped, we'll send you a tracking number via email.

returns.policy: You can return any product within 30 days of purchase for a full refund. Items must be unused and in their original packaging.
returns.process: To start a return, contact our support team or go to the returns section on our website to get a prepaid return label.
returns.refund_time: Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days after we receive the returned items.

payments.methods: We accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express, and PayPal. Apple Pay and Google Pay are also available for mobile users.
payments.security: All transactions are securely encrypted. Your payment information is never stored on our servers.
payments.issues: If you're having trouble with payment, please try a different card or contact your bank. You can also reach out to our support team for assistance.

account.create: To create an account, click on the 'Sign Up' button at the top of our homepage and fill in the required information.
account.password_reset: If you've forgotten your password, click 'Forgot Password' on the login page and follow the instructions to reset it.
account.update_info: To update your personal information, log in to your account and go to 'Account Settings'.

products.availability: Product availability is shown on the product page. If an item is out of stock, you can sign up for notifications to be alerted when it's back.
products.sizing: Each product has a size guide link on the product page. For further assistance, contact our support team.
products.care_instructions: Care instructions are provided on each product page under 'Product Details'.

order.status: To check your order status, log into your account and go to 'My Orders'. You'll find updates on processing, shipping, and delivery.
order.cancel: You can cancel your order within 2 hours of placing it by going to 'My Orders' and selecting 'Cancel'. After that, please contact support.
order.change: If you need to modify your order, please contact support within 2 hours of purchase. We'll do our best to accommodate changes.

discounts.codes: Promo codes can be applied at checkout. Make sure they haven't expired and meet the minimum order requirements.
discounts.eligibility: Some discounts are limited to certain items or categories. Check the promotion's terms and conditions for details.
discounts.gift_cards: Gift cards are available in various amounts. They can be purchased on our website and redeemed during checkout.

contact.email: You can reach us by email at support@example.com. Our team is available Monday to Friday, 9 AM - 5 PM.
contact.phone: For urgent inquiries, call us at (123) 456-7890. Our phone lines are open Monday to Friday, 9 AM - 5 PM.
contact.live_chat: Live chat support is available on our website during business hours. Look for the chat icon in the bottom right corner.
